title: For sale - 5 T205 Buybacks from 2003 issue (3 left - 1 day sale)
author: Centauri

posts.post_title: For sale - 5 T205 Buybacks from 2003 issue (3 left - 1 day sale)
posts.post_content:
This was something I was interested in for a bit - collecting different T205's still in their buyback cases. These cards are in the 2-3 range. No major creases, stains, etc. but wear along the edges and corners.

Raymond - $80 Piedmont 25 short print (sold)
Stovall - $35 Sweet Cap
Reulbach - $40 Cycle (sold)
Bescher - $35 Sweet Cap (t206 holder)
Lord - $35 Piedmont 25 (t206 holder)

I am willing to discount for multiples - $65 for 2, $90 for all 3 if purchased by Monday. Prices include shipping.
